By continuing, you have to agree Rupyz You hereby consent to RUPYZ.COM being appointed as your authorised representative to receive your Credit Information on an ongoing basis until the purpose of educating you of your own credit history, providing credit management services/advisory and data analytics services to you, curating personalized credit offers and facilitating the same to you (‚ÄúEnd Use Purpose‚Äù) is satisfied or expiry of 6 months from date the consent is collected; whichever is earlier. You hereby consent to RUPYZ.COM being appointed as your authorised representative to receive your Credit Information from Equifax for the purpose of educating you of your own credit history, providing credit management services/advisory and data analytics services to you, curating personalized credit offers and facilitating the same to you (‚ÄúEnd Use Purpose‚Äù). Terms of Service Experian Consent Equifax Consent BY EXECUTING THIS AGREEMENT / CONSENT FORM, YOU ARE EXPRESSLY AGREEING TO ACCESS THE EXPERIAN CREDIT INFORMATION REPORT AND CREDIT SCORE, AGGREGATE SCORES, INFERENCES, REFERENCES AND DETAILS (AS DEFINED BELOW)(TOGETHER REFERRED AS ‚ÄúCREDIT INFORMATION‚Äù). YOU HEREBY ALSO IRREVOCABLY AND UNCONDITIONALLY CONSENT TO SUCH CREDIT INFORMATION BEING PROVIDED BY EXPERIAN TO YOU AND RUPYZ.COM BY USING EXPERIAN TOOLS, ALGORITHMS AND DEVICES AND YOU HEREBY AGREE, ACKNOWLEDGE AND ACCEPT THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS SET FORTH HEREIN. Information Collection, Use, Confidentiality, No-Disclosure and Data Purging RUPYZ.COM shall access your Credit Information as your authorized representative and RUPYZ.COM shall use the Credit Information for limited End Use Purpose consisting of and in relation to the services proposed to be availed by you from RUPYZ.COM. We shall not aggregate, retain, store, copy, reproduce, republish, upload, post, transmit, sell or rent the Credit Information to any other person and the same cannot be copied or reproduced other than as agreed herein and in furtherance to CICRA. The Parties agree to protect and keep confidential the Credit Information both online and offline. The Credit Information shared by you, or received on by us on your behalf shall be destroyed, purged, erased promptly within 1 (one) Business Day of upon the completion of the transaction/ End Use Purpose for which the Credit Information report was procured. Governing Law and Jurisdiction The relationship between you and RUPYZ.COM shall be governed by laws of India and all claims or disputes arising there from shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Mumbai. Definitions: Capitalised terms used herein but not defined above shall have the following meanings: ‚ÄúBusiness Day‚Äù means a day (other than a public holiday) on which banks are open for general business in Mumbai. ‚ÄúCredit Information Report‚Äù means the credit information / scores/ aggregates / variables / inferences or reports which shall be generated by Experian; ‚ÄúCredit Score‚Äù means the score which shall be mentioned on the Credit Information Report which shall be computed by Experian. ‚ÄúCICRA‚Äù shall mean the Credit Information Companies (Regulation) Act, 2005 read with the Credit Information Companies Rules, 2006 and the Credit Information Companies Regulations, 2006, and shall include any other rules and regulations prescribed thereunder.

There are loan accounts with a default history in your credit report.The presence of these accounts is impacting your credit score.\n\nTo know more- Click on the Overdue, Negative a/c and Defaults a/c tile.\n\nNegative and Default accounts include-\n\n1. Loan accounts with an overdue or\n\n2. Any past or present loan a/c with a history of a default or\n\n3. Legal suit filed by the lenders\n\nPresence of these accounts negatively impact your credit score. There are few missed payments in your credit report.\n\nMissed payment in the recent months substantially impact your credit score. To improve your score make sure you do not miss any payment in the future.\n\nTo know more about the accounts with missed repayments. Click on the Missed repayments tile.
Missed payment in the recent months substantially impact your credit score. To improve your score make sure you do not miss any payment in future.\n\nTo know more about the accounts with missed repayments. Click on the Missed repayments tile.
Missed payment in the recent months substantially impact your credit score. To improve your score make sure you do not miss any payment in future.\n\nTo know more about the accounts with missed repayments. Click on the Missed repayments tile.
Congratulations\n\n100% of your repayments are on time.\n\n
Your credit card utilization is Very high. It is negatively impacting your credit score. Try to keep credit card utilization below 50% of the credit card limit. Your credit card utilization is fair. For a good credit score, try to keep credit card utilization below 20% of the credit card limit. Your credit card utilization is high. To further improve your score try to keep credit card utilization below 40% of the credit card limit Awesome! You spend money wisely. To maintain a good credit score, keep maintaining credit card utilization below 20% of the credit card limit.

A ‚Äúcredit score‚Äù ranging from 300 to 900, represents your credibility based on your borrowings and repayment history since you first took the loan or any credit facility. 300 means low credibility and 900 means high credibility. A credit score represents a score from 300-900. It indicates your credibility based on the repayment behavior of your loans and credit card. The score category below is a generally accepted industry standard. Experian or any other credit bureau does not provide the information category bifurcation.
Please Select Tenure in Month / Year
What is Equifax Commercial Rank (ECR) - It is a grade assigned to the businesses based on its credit profile, credit behavior and firmographics on a scale of 1 to 10, ECR-1 being the least risky business and ECR-10 being the most risky business. Higher the ECR, higher the probability of default associated with the business. Please wait Outstanding Amount Doubtful Standard
Credit History at a Glance Decode your credit history Score Insights Insights Activity Inventory Key factors affecting your score

"Negative and Default accounts include- \n 1. Loan accounts with an overdue or \n2. Any past or present loan a/c with a history of a default or \n3. Legal suit filed by the lenders \nPresence of these accounts negatively impact your credit score. " "Missed payment in the recent months substantially impact your commercial rank and credit score. To improve your commercial rank, make sure you do not miss any payment in the future. \n\nTo know more about the accounts with missed repayments. Click on the Missed repayments tile." "Credit age is the length of time that has passed since you opened your first credit account. Higher credit age is better for the credit score. \n\nTo know more- Read our blog ""What causes your credit score to fall?"" in learn section " "Too many recent loans and loan enquiries negatively impact your credit score. Avoid random applying for loan with lenders. Check your elegiblity before applying with respective lender.
To know more- Read our blog ""What causes your credit score to fall?"" in learn section" Firmographic includes business vintage, Nature of business, industry and size of the organization. Lender mix has low impact on overall commercial rank but too many loans from NBFCs and small finance bank adversely impact your credit rank. No Defaults & NPA Account

Parent Step %s: Go to Setting App Select App Management Select Apps Select Rupyz App Select Permission Select Location Select Allow All The Time Proceed with\nsame number Offline Mode Offline Visit This will allow staffs to run app without internet, but only few feature will work such as Lead, Customer, Order, Payment, Activity, etc. Geo-Fencing and Location Tracking Will not Work in Offline Mode. Enable Offline Mode This will take some time to download data to mobile and also use mobile space. Are you sure you want to use offline mode? Yes, Enable Downloading Data Disable Offline Mode This is erase all data from mobile only. Are you sure you want to disable offline mode? Downloading Data for offline mode This is only one time setup %s minutes remaining Yes, Disable Yes,\nCancel No,\nContinue Enable to send push location Cancel Data Download Cancel Data Upload Are you sure you want to cancel, as this will exit the offline mode settings?
